text_block_list.text: In my room, I was looking over Mejiro Ardan's data.

After looking over her past mock race results, it was pretty obvious 
that this wasn't her strength.

Even if she's trying to get up to speed, the reality is that her 
days of being unable to participate in Selection Races are 
continuing. I can understand why she's in a hurry…

That's when I finally realized. Selection Races were originally 
meant as a place for Uma Musume to show off their abilities and 
get scouted by Trainers.
Which means―
…Oh. You're offering to scout me?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
To begin with, if she already has a trainer, then there'd be 
no reason to be so desperate to enter a Selection Race.

That incident with the tablet was what caught my interest in the 
first place. Like this, she won't have to participate with such 
disavantageous conditions―

Fufuu, thank you very much. 
I'm very honored to hear that.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
However — I apologize. 
I'll have to refuse.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ah, but please don't misunderstand. 
My reason for it is not because of Trainer.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Regardless of who was going to ask me, I intended to reject their 
offer in the same manner.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Please, in the upcoming Selection Race, could I ask you to 
confirm my abilities with your own eyes?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
After all, it won't do to accept your scouting without having you 
see what I am capable of.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Oh… is it possible, you were about to say that the race is 
outside my aptitudes?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Then, with your permission, I'd like to ask you something, Trainer.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Leaving aside the Twinkle series, are races something 
that will always be run in the way you expect, at every moment?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Are there not times where the race rotation does not go as 
you expected? Times when the weather takes a turn for the worse?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Or maybe times when you're out of sorts. Or times when you 
must take the course in a manner you're weak at.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: If that's the case, all of that―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Does not become a reason to not aim for victory, does it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Mejiro Ardan was smiling. She said all of that with a smile.

But having said that, I do understand that 
what I'm doing is somewhat unreasonable. 
However, I also feel like this―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
If I take one step backwards here, in a pivotal moment in competition, 
I may hesitate to progress forward.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Just like the other day, she left me speechless again. 
I ended up standing on the spot once more.
She was moving forward with such heavy resolve.

It seems our conversation may have gone on for a bit too long. 
I shall be excusing myself here.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
By all means, next time- 
after the Selection Race, I'll be waiting for you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
After that, in preparation for the Selection Race, day after day, I saw 
Mejiro Ardan training hard.

Dirt, on top of that being 1200m means that 
knowing where to accelerate in the beginning will be important…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Maybe I should focus more of my practice on starts, and 
incorporate reaction speed into my training regimen…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: As expected, she's working hard, and through trial and error—

Ardan! Um… your Selection Race is soon 
isn't it? If you're okay with it, let me join you for training!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Be it parallel running, slopes, or laps around the school, 
I'm fine with anything!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Oh, thank you very much, Chiyono O. 
Your offer makes me very happy.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
But, I'm sorry. I need to call it a day here. 
I've been gradually starting to feel a bit more feverish today.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ah… i-is that so? 
I'm sorry for suddenly asking that…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
No no, please ask me again another day. Fufuu, thinking 
about how much I'm looking forward to that, I'll 
have to be careful not to get injured.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Eeh?! A-Ardan… I don't know if I should be happy or worried 
when you put it that way～!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…Even though she has a body weaker than others, she carries on 
with a gentle smile.

And so, the Selection Race arrived. Since before the start of 
the race, it had been raining heavily so this became a muddy 
1200m battle. There, Mejiro Ardan was―
(Whooooooooooooaaa?!)

Here comes Mejiro Ardan! Here comes Mejiro Ardan!! 
The goal is right infront of her! She's in first 
but the others are right behind her!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: -aaaaahhhhh!!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Will Ardan hold on?! Will they catch her?! 
Now― They cross the goal!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ardan wins by a nose!! With that last push, 
she holds on! The one who grasped first place in 
this Selection Race is Mejiro Ardan!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (Whooooooooooooaaa!!)
No… way. Wasn't she… supposed to have no aptitude for this…?!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C

text_block_list.text: M-Mejiro Ardan! Excuse me, but do you have a moment?!
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Me too…! Your run just now, was wonderful. 
If you're fine with it, then join my―
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
As expected, Mejiro Ardan is surrounded by 
trainers aiming to scout her. But…!!
choice_data_list: <size=41>Let me through! Please let me through!!</size>

text_block_list.text:
I desperately push through the crowd until I'm finally standing in front 
of her! And then…
Oh? You are…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list:
<size=35>You said 'After the selection 
race', so I'm here.</size>

text_block_list.text: …Fufuu, that's true.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Mejiro Ardan stood there saying nothing for a moment, looking directly at me. And then―

Thank you very much. 
I'm very honored to hear that.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
By all means — I accept. 
On this path ahead, will you please accompany me?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
